module.name: advancedstock
module.description: Advanced Stock is a PrestaShop ERP's module providing the features to manage your stocks in different warehouses, edit stock levels using a barcode scanner or register stock movements in your back
module.author: Community developer
module.description_full: Advanced Stock is a PrestaShop ERP's module providing the features to manage your stocks in different warehouses, edit stock levels using a barcode scanner or register stock movements in your back office.
module.additional_description: Gain in productivity and save time in your stock management by managing stock movements and changes and the activity list of these. PrestaShop ERP's Advanced Stock allows you to:Register stock movements from a warehouse to another oneSet attributes for each one of your warehouses : name, address, opening hours, status,...Keep an activity list of movements Be aware of your stock levels

module.name: mollie
module.description: Mollie ist ein Zahlungsdienstleister, der Lösungen für Unternehmer entwickelt, um ihre Online-Zahlungen zu erhalten und zu verwalten
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Mollie ist ein Zahlungsdienstleister, der Lösungen für Unternehmer entwickelt, um ihre Online-Zahlungen zu erhalten und zu verwalten. Wir tun dies, indem wir immer einen Schritt weiter schauen, mit dem Ziel, die Zahlungsbranche durcheinander zu bringen. Mit der robusten und dennoch einfachen Mollie API können Einzelhändler ihren Kunden eine Vielzahl von Zahlungsmethoden anbieten. Mollie betreut sowohl kleinere lokale Kaufleute als auch internationale Unternehmen. Mit 20 verschiedenen internationalen Zahlungsmethoden müssen Sie sich nicht von Grenzen definieren lassen, sondern haben die Freiheit zu wachsen, wo immer Sie wollen. Alles, was Sie tun müssen, ist das kostenlose Plugin von Mollie herunterzuladen und es in Ihren Prestashop-Webshop integrieren.
module.additional_description: Sie müssen nicht viel Zeit mit administrativen Aufgaben verbringen, um Ihr Unternehmen mit Mollie in Gang zu bringen. Sie können Ihr Konto in wenigen Minuten erstellen und mit der Annahme der am häufigsten verwendeten Zahlungsmethoden in Europa beginnen. Es gibt weder versteckte Gebühren noch Abonnementgebühren. Zudem bezahlen Sie nur für erfolgreiche Transaktionen.

module.name: psbuybutton
module.description: Verkaufen Sie Ihre Produkte aus Ihren Blogartikeln oder externen Websites, indem Sie Call-to-Action- und Buy-Buttons hinzufügen
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Verkaufen Sie Ihre Produkte aus Ihren Blogartikeln oder externen Websites, indem Sie Call-to-Action- und Buy-Buttons hinzufügen.   Ihre Besucher gelangen mit nur einem Klick in ihren Warenkorb, direkt vom Namen Ihres Produkts in einem Blog oder einer externen Website.   Mit dem Modul Buy Button erhöhen Sie Ihren Traffic und Ihre Konversionsrate, aber immer im Rahmen Ihrer visuellen Identität!
module.additional_description: Bereicherung des Inhalts Ihrer externen Websites, CMS, Blog, indem die genannten Produkte hervorgehoben werden.Steigerung des Traffics in Ihrem Shop, indem Besucher von externen Websites oder E-Mail-Kampagnen weitergeleitet werden.Erhöhung Ihrer Konversionsrate, indem die Dauer und die Anzahl der Etappen in Ihrem Kaufvorgang gesenkt werden.

module.name: pscustomblock
module.description: Optimieren Sie das Design und die Darstellung Ihrer Startseite, indem Sie mit wenigen Mausklicks einfach zu gestaltende Bild- und Textblöcke hinzufügen!   Mit dem Modul Bloc Custom Home
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Optimieren Sie das Design und die Darstellung Ihrer Startseite, indem Sie mit wenigen Mausklicks einfach zu gestaltende Bild- und Textblöcke hinzufügen!   Mit dem Modul Bloc Custom Homepage können Sie Ihre Seite ansprechender und wirkungsvoller gestalten und die Internetnutzer bereits beim ersten Besuch Ihres Onlineshops überzeugen!
module.additional_description: Gewinnen Sie die Aufmerksamkeit Ihrer Besucher, sobald sie sich auf der Website Ihres Shops befinden. Ein Internetnutzer benötigt im Durchschnitt nur 3 Sekunden, um zu entscheiden, ob er auf einer Website bleibt und 8 Sekunden, um eine Aktion auszuführen. Vermitteln Sie Ihren Besuchern einen optimalen Eindruck und senken Sie die Absprungrate Ihrer Website! Verbessern Sie Ihre Startseite und heben Sie die Besonderheiten Ihres Shops hervor. Die Startseite ist das Schaufenster Ihres Onlineshops. Hier sollten Sie alle Besonderheiten und Vorteile hervorheben, mit denen Sie sich von Ihren Konkurrenten abheben. Mit unserem Modul Bloc Custom Homepage können Sie über Bild- und Textblöcke die wichtigsten Informationen anzeigen und Ihre Besucher mit einem einfachen und eleganten Design überzeugen. Überzeugen Sie potenzielle Kunden und steigern Sie Ihre Konversionsrate. Im Rahmen einer Stanford-Studie haben 75 % aller Internetnutzer angegeben, die Glaubwürdigkeit eines Unternehmens anhand des Designs seiner Website zu beurteilen. Mit einem professionellen Look Ihrer Website stärken Sie das Vertrauensverhältnis zwischen Ihrem Unternehmen und den Verbrauchern und regen die Besucher dazu an, die Inhalte zu durchstöbern, einen Kauf zu tätigen oder Sie zu kontaktieren.

module.name: psmassedit
module.description: Steigern Sie die Produktivität bei der Bearbeitung von Produkten
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Steigern Sie die Produktivität bei der Bearbeitung von Produkten. Egal ob es um Preise, den Lagerbestand oder die Produktkategorie geht: bearbeiten Sie diese Informationen für mehrere Produkte gleichzeitig oder planen Sie entsprechende Bearbeitungen - mit nur wenigen Mausklicks.   Mit Hilfe geeigneter Filter und eines Suchfeldes können Sie die zu bearbeitenden Produkte schnell auswählen und beispielsweise einen Rabatt von 20 % oder einen Preisanstieg um 15 € anwenden, 100 Artikel zum Lager hinzufügen oder eine neue Kategorie zu einer bestimmten Auswahl hinzufügen. Diese Vorgänge können jederzeit geplant und rückgängig gemacht werden.
module.additional_description: Filtern Sie die zu bearbeitenden Produkte nach Name, ID, Preis, Artikelnummer, Kategorie, Lieferant oder Menge auf Lager sowie nach der genauen Übereinstimmung des Begriffs, dem Vorkommen oder einem Suchbereich.Wählen Sie die Produkte aus dem zu bearbeitenden Katalog aus und führen Sie mit nur 3 Mausklicks eine Sammelbearbeitung durch.Nutzen Sie ein Bearbeitungsprotokoll, um einen bestimmten Vorgang zu löschen, abzubrechen oder wiederherzustellen.

module.name: psrecaptcha
module.description: Dank des Moduls reCaptcha – Google Anti Spam vermeiden Sie die Spams von Robotern und sichern Konto-Erstellungen und Kontaktnachrichten mithilfe einer Technologie zur Erkennung menschlichen Verh
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Dank des Moduls reCaptcha – Google Anti Spam vermeiden Sie die Spams von Robotern und sichern Konto-Erstellungen und Kontaktnachrichten mithilfe einer Technologie zur Erkennung menschlichen Verhaltens. Please note that the ReCaptcha module is not compatible with the "one page checkout" option on PrestaShop 1.6. However, your ReCaptcha will be visible on the "one page checkout" on PrestaShop 1.7.
module.additional_description: ReCaptcha ist ein System, das die Fähigkeiten zur Erkennung menschlicher Nutzer mittels CAPTCHA-Tests (Completely Automated Public Turing test to tell Computer and Humans Apart) nutztBlockieren des Zugangs zu Ihrem Shop für Roboter und Spams bei der Erstellung eines Kontos, der Verbindung zu einem Konto und dem Versenden von Kontaktnachrichten.

module.name: productseverywhere
module.description: Show products everywhere in your shop. You can configure which products do you want to show, what will be his audience and where will be shown them in the shop
module.author: Idnovate
module.description_full: Show products everywhere in your shop. You can configure which products do you want to show, what will be his audience and where will be shown them in the shop.
module.additional_description: Show products everywhere You will have a powerful feature to show a customized selection of your products virtually in any place of your shop. Configurable products listYou can configure the list of products you want to show with a large variety of options and filters to adapt it to your customers. A single paymentThe module has no additional costs. You only need to make one payment for the module licence for your store.

module.name: tathanksshopping
module.displayName: Thanks Shopping : A THANKS that prints the difference $
module.description: For each order, with one 1-click print a nice personalized thank you note accompanied by a unique discount coupon to encourage them to purchase again
module.author: TimActive
module.description_full: For each order, with one 1-click print a nice personalized thank you note accompanied by a unique discount coupon to encourage them to purchase again.1st automatic and easy-to-use solution to develop your business image and increase sales.
module.additional_description: Increase your sales, retain and CAPITALIZE your customers! Now with Thanks Shopping attaching a nice personalized thank you note after the purchase is super easy. Plus the choice to accompany it with a unique discount coupon and… the icing on the cake, everything is automatic, a dream!!!! do you want to know more ??? + FINALLY CAPITALIZE YOUR CUSTOMERS + The module will be INDISPENSABLE when you sell on the Marketplaces and you don’t have e-mails. Simply slip your personalized Thanks in your parcels or send it by post. + BOOST YOUR SALES + With Thanks Shopping, nothing more simple and fun to multiply your turnover. Boost your sales by encouraging a new purchase Depending on your setting, your thank you note may be accompanied by a unique discount coupon that is also automatically generated. All the discount possibilities provided by PrestaShop for the coupons are included (percentage reduction, amount, offer a gift). Boost your sales by facilitating the purchase process. Yes, the thank you note can include a QRCode to automate the process: Automatic identification, automatic coupon addition... Did you know? Since 2017 smart-phones can scan the QRCode from the camera; no need for any additional apps. As mobile-tech is moving towards QRCode standards, we are at the forefront. + TEMPLATE EDITOR THAT WILL SHOW YOUR CREATIVITY + Without any technical knowledge, an innovative module integrating a fully equipped template editor that will simplify your creations, but also!! Insert your text... your logo... images… and more, even QR Codes by simply dragging and dropping. Easy at that.. And that's not all, thanks to its powerful variable system and translation features we will make your message personal. Not to mention the ability to download your own fonts and images to create your most beautiful templates all in one snap. + TEMPLATES OFFERED + Out of inspiration, our designers have thought of you! A decent collection of templates, all ready to use, are included in the module. Import, and Edit at your convenience, it’s a breeze to use... +A THANK YOU ADAPTED TO  EACH OF YOUR CUSTOMER + It’s all possible thanks to our scenario based approach, the module always allows you to generate the right note to the right customer by making your own criteria based logic according to:     Customer information (country, age, civility, group...).    The order content (amount, product, products category).    Season (Christmas, New Year, Valentine's Day, Mother's Day ...). Showcase your creativity with the advanced tools available to you, here are some examples: Scenario 1: For New Customers (order Generate a personalized thank you note using the "New Customers" template. => Generate a discount coupon of 10% valid for a second purchase => ... Scenario 2: For Loyal Customers (order> 4) => Generate a personalized thank you note using the "Loyal Customers" template => Generate a 15% discount coupon valid for the next purchase => ... Scenario 3: For marketplace orders (marketplace containing the email) => Generate a thank you note by welcoming to your shop using the "Marketplace Customers" template. => ... Scenario 4: Christmas Season (From December 01 to December 25) => Generate a note using the "Christmas surprise gift" model. => Generate a discount coupon with a specific product. => ... + ADVANCED STATISTICS + The module offers a set of advanced reports to track your return on investment: The evaluation and inspection of sales generated from used coupon codes).Reports of scanned / converted Thanks scenarios. Or using the tab "My thanks" follow each thanks individually in order to know :  If the Thanks has been scanned.If the included coupon has been used. Thanks to the statistics and observation of the clients behavior you can benefit by: → Improving your templates → Improving your scenarios to build a productive autonomous system + AN INTUITIVE AND EASY MODULE TO IMPLEMENT +  "Full of features but quick and easy to adopt: Our research  with a committee of about twenty merchants, permits that the module offers a clear and pleasant to user interface, with a short learning curve. " Be guided by Emma's short video tutorials to quickly get going. + WE SUPPORT AND LISTEN + "Because your time is precious and we want your full satisfaction!" In 2019 Source "addons.prestashop.com": Number of tickets received: 209 Quality of the answers: 3/3 Average time: 6.3h Positive ratings attributed to our modules: 317 Overall quality of our after-sales service: 100%

module.name: alcapixelfacebook
module.description: Facebook Pixel for PS1.6/1.7. Analyze all the activity of your store and boost its performance, optimizing to the maximum the advertising campaigns of FB. Registers most events
module.author: Alcalink
module.description_full: Facebook Pixel for PS1.6/1.7. Analyze all the activity of your store and boost its performance, optimizing to the maximum the advertising campaigns of FB. Registers most events. Ease of installation, configuration and use.
module.additional_description: Once you associate your Facebook pixel ID to our module, you will begin to record all the movements of users within your store. In this way, analyzing the activity you will know first hand the concerns of the users of your business, optimizing your Facebook advertising campaigns to reach new potential customers. This will put you in touch with the right people and those who are more likely to make purchases. Ideal to carry out remarketing with the customers of your store. You will also know the performance of your store, to improve it and enhance your products. In addition, great ease of installation, so there is no need for advanced computer skills to operate Facebook Pixel. Spanish, English, Italian and French are the available languages for Facebook Pixel. In addition, with our documentation explaining step by step both the installation, the configuration and the use of the module in a few minutes you will have it fully functioning on your website.

module.name: zakeke
module.description: Let your buyers customize and view their personalized product before purchasing. Get happy customers buying from you and coming back for more
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Let your buyers customize and view their personalized product before purchasing. Get happy customers buying from you and coming back for more.
module.additional_description: Wow your visitors: customers can see their fully customized product before buying Less back and forth: get an approved, ready-for-print file for all your custom order Increase your margins: charge a percentage or a fixed rate for each customization Grow your sales: give your customers the exact product they are looking for More time on your site: real-time 3D product previews give visitors an immersive experience Zakeke Product Customizer lets customers personalize any product (clothing, promotional gifts, paper products, shoes, jewelry, watches) and visualize how they’ll look before checking out. You’ll never have to prepare proofs again or hear back from angry customers complaining “this isn’t what it’s supposed to look like”. Customers always know what they are going to get before buying, which means fewer refunds, fewer complaints, and more 5-star ratings.

module.name: btsnapchatads
module.description: Export your products on Snapchat, create innovative product ads, retarget with the pixel
module.author: Business Tech
module.description_full: Export your products on Snapchat, create innovative product ads, retarget with the pixel
module.additional_description: More and more social network users are turning away from Facebook to join the Snapchat community. With nearly 190 million active users per day, Snapchat has become the number one social network among 18-34 year olds thanks to its interactive and fun content that differs from Facebook, Instagram and Twitter standard formats. Moreover, faced with strong competition from brands that promote their products on major networks such as Facebook or Twitter, it has now become difficult to stand out and capture the attention of users. With fewer advertisers in Snapchat, it is much easier to get known and attract new customers to your site. Do you already advertise on other social networks such as Facebook or Instagram? Take advantage of Snapchat's innovative advertising formats and low competition to make yourself known to a new audience. With the Snap Pixel, optimize the delivery of your ads to the Snapchatters who are most likely to purchase your products. Then track your campaigns effect by analyzing the number of actions (product view, add to cart, purchase,...) performed by Snapchatters on your site after interacting with your ad.Finally, and once you have reached the required threshold of interactions between Snapchatters and your site (https://businesshelp.snapchat.com/en-US/a/snap-pixel-faq#Audiences), use one of the most interesting features of the pixel, dynamic remarketing. Create custom audiences based on the Snapchatters' activity on your site and then capture their attention again on the social network with targeted ads to encourage them to return to your shop.

module.name: fruugo
module.description: The Fruugo module, created together with Invertus, is designed to make it easy for retailers to generate orders from all over the world
module.author: Invertus
module.description_full: The Fruugo module, created together with Invertus, is designed to make it easy for retailers to generate orders from all over the world.
module.additional_description: The Fruugo Marketplace module, created together with Invertus, is designed to make it easy for retailers to generate orders from all over the world. Fruugo technology allows customers to shop from global retailers using their own language and currency, using the payment methods popular in their countries. Using this powerful module, retailers can generate additional sales from customers in over 40 countries. All language, currency and payment localisation is handled by Fruugo and as retailers are always paid in their own currency and as fees are only commission based, there is no risk. Included in the package is Fruugo’s extensive use of sophisticated digital marketing to drive active shoppers directly to retailers’ products, with orders sent to retailers for fulfilment to customers. The official Fruugo Marketplace module is designed to make it easy and simple to export your items from PrestaShop to Fruugo, one of the top largest marketplaces in the world. With this simple integration you have a risk free way to grow your online business by reaching new customers all over the world.To use the Fruugo Marketplace Module retailers must sign for and be accepted for a free Fruugo business account. (http://sell.fruugo.com)
